name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Staff Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **data analysis** and delivering high-performance applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial industries. Skilled in **AI**, and **machine learning**, leveraging advanced technologies to develop innovative solutions. Proven expertise in **collaboration** and **mentorship** to foster high-performing teams dedicated to **product feature development** and aligning technology with business strategy.

Proficient in **Java** and adept in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend development, using frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines.

Strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, while proficient in MLOps practices, including model training, serving, and orchestration with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
